title: Regulated degradation of KCC2, a potassium-chloride co-transporter required for synaptic transmission and neurodevelopment.
abstract: Neuronal function requires fine-tuned and coordinated activity of several ion channels and transporters. One member of this ensemble is the KCC2 potassium-chloride cotransporter.
